item.title: AI chatbot’s simple ‘123456’ password risked exposing personal data of millions of McDonald’s job applicants
item.description: Security researchers found two flaws in an AI-powered chatbot used by McDonald’s to interact with job applicants.

item.title: Helios wants to be the AI operating system for public policy professionals
item.description: Helios, a startup aiming to build an AI-powered operating system for policy professionals, has raised $4 million in seed funding.
